group_1.narration: I visited several cities outside of@Mitakihara and Kazamino's suburbs.
I wanted to try to determine@if the sudden disappearance@of Witches is limited to there.
In each city however, the situation@was no different from Mitakihara.

group_1.textLeft: (Yet again, there's no trace of magic.)
(Could this mean that Witches are@disappearing from the entire world?)
No, it can't be…

group_1.textRight: It is unusual to see you looking for@Witches outside your usual area.

group_1.textLeft: ...!@[chara:200500:motion_0]Kyubey...
My, no.@I just protect my territory.
I have no need for@extra Grief Seeds.
I only take what I need.@That said...
Of late…
I can't find enough Seeds in my@own territory to sustain myself.
That's why I'm here in this unfamiliar town.

group_1.textRight: That confirms it…@The number of Witches has been falling.

group_1.textLeft: Confirms it?

group_1.textRight: The other Magical Girls have @been saying the same thing.

group_1.textLeft: So you're saying that [chara:200500:motion_100]Witches@are disappearing everywhere?

group_1.textRight: I haven't gathered information@from every single town.
there are fewer and fewer Witches@in cities far from Mitakihara, as well.

group_1.textLeft: In cities that are far away from Mitakihara…

group_1.textRight: You don't need much magic@to maintain your bodies so…
…there seems to be a lot of Magical@Girls that are happy to take a break.
But all the dedicated Magical Girls@like yourself...
They have been going out of their@respective territories just like you are.

group_1.textLeft: No matter how small the amount @is, we do consume our magic...
What happens if I can't fight when I need to?@

group_1.textRight: With that attitude, you@are a model Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: It's ironic…
We use our power to slay Witches.
Yet the only source we have@for our magic is Witches.

group_1.textRight: You get a Grief Seed for killing a Witch.
You get magic from the Seed,@and use it to slay another Witch.
The Magical Girl system is@an exceedingly logical cycle...

group_1.textLeft: A cycle, you say...
But what happens [chara:810000:effect_fadeout]if the Witches,@critical cogs in the system, disappear?
...Kyubey?
